alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Jefferson; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine; Washington; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:59PM CDT until April 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ozaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Milwaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Northern Racine County in southeastern Wisconsin... Waukesha County in southeastern Wisconsin... Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1059 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Ripley to near Raymond, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Racine, Waukesha, West Allis, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Greenfield, Menomonee Falls, Oak Creek, West Bend, Muskego, Watertown, Mequon, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Whitewater, Hartford, Whitefish Bay, and Greendale. This includes the following Locations Boerner Botanical Gardens, General Mitchell International Airport, Timmerman Airport, Froedert & the Medical College, Fiserv Forum, Pewaukee Lake, Ottawa Lake Recreation Area, and Pinewoods Campground. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Jefferson; Milwaukee; Ozaukee; Racine; Washington; Waukesha
